description: Allows you to split damage from Antimatter Cannons over several targets.

description: Enemy Neutron Bombs have no effect.

name: Warp Portal (Tech)
description: Immediately place the Warp Portal Tile on any of your controlled hexes. The Warp Portal connects to all other Warp Portals and is worth 1VP at the end of the game if controlled.
